meanings.definition: A unit of land measurement equal to about 0.85 acres.
meanings.sent1: The farmer owned several arpens of land.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent estimated the property to be around five arpens.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel claimed an arpen of the park as its territory.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening extended to every arpen of her backyard.
meanings.sent5: The old map showed the boundaries of the kingdom in arpens.
